AboutDialog.Title: About
ConflictDecisionDialog.CheckBox.SkipSame: Skip %1 entries with the same date and size
ConflictDecisionDialog.Label.HeaderText1: Which entries do you want to keep?
ConflictDecisionDialog.Label.HeaderText2: If you select two entries, a numerical sequence will be added to the name of the target file.
ConflictDecisionDialog.WindowTitle: There are %1 conflicting entries in total
ProgressDialog.Button.KeepAll.ToolTip: All will be retained. Conflicting entries will have a numerical sequence number added after the target file name
ProgressDialog.Label.EcsTipText: The target contains %1 entries with the same name
SettingsWidget.CheckBox.KeepDialogOnErro: Keep dialog display when error occurred
SettingsWidget.CheckBox.RemoveToTrash: When deleting files, move them to the Recycle Bin
SettingsWidget.KeyCombinationInputer.Too: Press ESC to cancel, Press Delete to remove hotkey
SettingsWidget.LineEdit.RenamePattern.Pl: Input the rename pattern, `@` and `#` is necessary.
SettingsWidget.Text.RenamePatternTips:
Placeholder available:
"@": The original file name
"#": The number

Example:
For pattern "@-linked-#", The original file "file.ext" maybe be rename to "file-linked-1.ext"
